details: Weaker opponents refer to enemies lower level than you

build: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/shadowstep.png} tip={Shadowstep}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/uncanny-luck.png} tip={Uncanny Luck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/the-way-of-shadows.png} tip={The Way of Shadows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-pursuit.png} tip={Chain Arts: Pursuit}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapon-mastery.png} tip={Weapon Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapon-booster.png} tip={Weapon Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-ii.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/wisdom-of-shadows.png} tip={Wisdom of Shadows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-yank.png} tip={Chain Yank}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory-ii.png} tip={Muscle Memory II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-iii.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/determination.png} tip={Determination}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/cheap-shot.png} tip={Cheap Shot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/keen-eye.png} tip={Keen Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-decoy-bomb.png} tip={Summon Decoy Bomb}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory-iii.png} tip={Muscle Memory III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-iv.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/weapons-expert.png} tip={Weapons Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/cheap-shot-ii.png} tip={Cheap Shot II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/wisdom-of-shadows-ii.png} tip={Wisdom of Shadows II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/nova-warrior.png} tip={Nova Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Chain Arts: Reign of Chains}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/nova-temperance.png} tip={Nova Temperance}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-less-arts-reinforce.png} tip={Chain-less Arts - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-less-arts-boss-rush.png} tip={Chain-less Arts - Boss Rush}> Chain-less Arts - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-reinforce.png} tip={Chain Arts: Thrash - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-thrash-linked-attack-reinforce.png} tip={Chain Arts Thrash - Linked Attack Reinforce}> Chain Arts: Thrash - Reinforce and Linked Attack Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown - Cooldown Cutter}> Chain Arts: Beatdown - Cooldown Cutter_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers and Summon Shuriken (3rd Job / 2nd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun and Summon Decoy Bomb (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar and Summon Claw (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/veteran-shadowdealer.png} tip={Crush and Veteran Shadowdealer (Hyper Skill)}> *
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
The last skill from the Tertiary Trio can be any skill as Cadena only has 8 skills to boost
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar and Summon Claw (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers and Summon Shuriken (3rd Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun and Summon Decoy Bomb (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/veteran-shadowdealer.png} tip={Crush and Veteran Shadowdealer (Hyper Skill)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build
content.specialThanks: Special thanks to SgtPickles for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Muscle Memory & Dark Sight
content: Cadena's skills utilize different weapons to defeat enemies. After 2nd Job, each time a unique weapon is used, gain a stack of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff. For each stack, gain increased %Final Damage (additively). Below is a list of skills that trigger <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> Summon Scimitar [1st Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw (2nd Job)}> Summon Claw [2nd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)}> Summon Shuriken [2nd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun (3rd Job)}> Summon Shotgun [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers (3rd Job)}> Summon Daggers [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-decoy-bomb.png} tip={Summon Decoy Bomb (3rd Job)}> Summon Decoy Bombs [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-brick.png} tip={Summon Brick (4th Job)}> Summon Brick [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-spiked-bat.png} tip={Summon Spiked Bat (4th Job)}> Summon Spiked Bat [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Chain Arts: Reign of Chains (4th Job)}}> Chain Arts: Reign of Chains [4th Job] refreshes Muscle Memory but does not add a stack_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> Chain Arts: Beatdown [4th Job] grants a full stack of Muscle Memory_>
<em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

In 1st Job, using <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-pursuit.png} tip={Chain Arts: Pursuit (1st Job)}> Chain Arts: Pursuit grants <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state. As well, in 4th Job, activating the additional chain attack from <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory-iii.png} tip={Muscle Memory III (4th Job)}> Muscle Memory III also grants <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Haggle
primary.shortDesc: Purchase items 4% cheaper at shops. Does not apply if the purchase cost is above 70% of the sales cost.\nWhen stacked with the Merchandising guild skill, the higher figure is applied first.
details: When stacked with Guild Skill <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/merchandising.png} tip={Merchandising (Guild Skill)}> Merchandising, the higher discount will be applied first

primary.name: Back to HQ
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Moves you to the Shadowdealers Hideout.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/214/Pioneer_of_Destiny} title={"Pioneer of Destiny"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Chain Arts: Pursuit
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 1.
100% chance to slow enemies for 5 sec. Enables Dark Sight state.
Cannot be hit for 2 sec. after you start moving.
When you move, if you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP by using Dark Sight, Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum.
Cooldown: 0.2 sec
primary.desc: Fire a grapple that can attach to enemies or terrain
details: Pressing an Arrow Key and Skill Key together allows you to direct the chain at a 45° angle upwards/downwards or straight if no Arrow Key is pressed

Upon use, the chain will attach to the target and apply a slow debuff if it is an enemy<bp_Pressing again will move you towards the target_While moving, you temporarily enter a <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state and cannot be hit_While in the <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly_>
Based on how long the Skill Key is held, the grapple distance will increase
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13,
[1st Hit] Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 2
[2nd Hit] Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2, 100% chance of slowing enemies for 5 sec.
Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +10% Final Damage (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).
primary.desc: Lash your whip forward that applies a slow debuff to enemies hit
details: The attack consists of two parts, the initial lash and the returning lash
Other skills can be used between the initial lash and returning lash<bp_Skills used immediately after the initial lash will deal increased %Final Damage (excluding returning lash)_>
The returning lash will push back enemies

primary.name: Summon Scimitar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 125%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward while slicing through enemies
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Shadowstep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: The Way of Shadows
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +15%

primary.name: Uncanny Luck
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 50

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash II
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits of 2nd hit

primary.name: Summon Claw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 235%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 4\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Slash downwards to the platform below
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Can only be used while in the air

primary.name: Summon Shuriken
primary.shortDesc:
Summons a Shuriken, MP Cost: 28, Duraation: 7 sec, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 205%
Number of Attacks: 1
Automatically explodes after 7 sec. Press the skill key again to manually detonate
Explosion deals 450% damage to up to 8 enemies 3 times
Cooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Summon a moving shuriken that pushes enemies
details: Upon expiring or pressing the Skill Key again, the shuriken will explode damaging nearby enemies
<tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state will not be deactivated when using this skill or by the explosion attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Chain Yank
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Pushed: 5
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Weapon Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Increases attack speed of all weapons for 200 sec.

primary.name: Muscle Memory
primary.shortDesc: Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +3% per stack, for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).\nRefreshing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 2, Cooldown: 0.2 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Damage for Scimitar +80% points]
primary.desc: Whenever a new Summon weapon skill is used, an additional attack will activate damaging nearby enemies
details: For each unique Summon weapon skill used, gain a stacking %Final Damage buff<bp_Each activation will refresh the buff duration_>
Additionally, permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Unaffected by %Buff Duration and cooldown resets

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery with Chain, and all Summoned Weapons increased by 50%.

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Wisdom of Shadows
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10, Critical Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +10%, Avoidability: +20%

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash III
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Increases %Damage of 2nd hit
Increases number of hits and max enemies hit

primary.name: Summon Shotgun
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30
Close-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 390%, Number of Attacks: 7
Mid-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 7
Long-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Fire a shotgun forward damaging enemies and recoiling you backwards
details: The damage of the attack will vary based on the distance the enemy is to the attack
While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Summon Daggers
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 8, Terror Chance: 100%, Duration: 30 sec, Enemy DEF -30%\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Slash upwards in place that damages enemies and applies a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Summon Decoy Bomb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, setting up a bomb that detonates after 1 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 415%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Leap backwards and throw bombs that explode after a delay
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
<tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state will not be deactivated when using this skill or by the explosion attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Muscle Memory II
primary.shortDesc:
Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +7% per stack, for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).
Refreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown for Bonus Hits: 0.2 sec
[Passive Effects - Damage for Summon Scimitar, Claw, Shuriken +100% points]
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Determination
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Cheap Shot
primary.shortDesc: Your attacks against enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses gain Critical Rate: +1%, Critical Damage +5%, Applies up to 5 Abnormal Statuses.

primary.name: Keen Eye
primary.shortDesc: Ignore DEF: +20%, Damage: +20%, Avoidability: +40%

primary.name: Chain Arts: Thrash IV
primary.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash 2nd Hit Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 5
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits of 2nd hit

primary.name: Summon Brick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 535%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Leap forward and launch a brick
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together performs a higher leap
While casting, you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Summon Spiked Bat
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40
1st Hit - Damage: 330%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 12
2nd Hit - Damage: 443%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 13
3rd Hit - Damage: 653%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 14
Enemies struck have a 100% chance to be confused for 30 sec, Enemy Attack: -20%
Cooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: Slam a bat forward consecutively up to 3 times that inflicts a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %Attack
Each consecutive strike deals increased damage
If another skill is used before the last hit, the skill will go on cooldown and the remaining hits cannot be utilized

primary.name: Chain Arts: Reign of Chains
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost per attack: 25, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec
Damage: 600%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 2, Attack Duration: 6 sec,
Can use directional keys to move while holding the skill key.
Cooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: While held, swing your chain to pull enemies in
details: Attack refreshes the <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff but does not count as a stack
Upon casting, you are briefly invincible
You can move while casting
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Chain Arts: Beatdown
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 255, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 2, Stun Duration: 10 sec
Increases stun duration up to 100% based on damage inflicted with Chain Arts: Beatdown.
For 5 sec after casting, depending on the number of additional hits activated by Muscle Memory, follow-up attack is divided into 3 levels. If the number of activations isn't met within this time, Strike occurs at the minimum level. If the max activation count is met within the time limit, the strike occurs immediately
Strike: Whem Muscle Memory number of activations is 0/3/5, respectively, attacks up to 10 enemies in their grouped location based on the level with 770%/880%/990% damage, respectively, 15 times(s), and activates a final attack that attacks 10 enemies with 250%/350%/500% damage, respectively 10 time(s)
During the consecutive attacks, activates a shockwave that attacks up to 10 enemies with 600% damage 4 time(s). Additional DEF Ignored: +80%.
Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Bind nearby enemies and release a powerful attack
details: Based on the number of times <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> is activated, the damage of the attack increases
This skill will not count towards <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff but will grant full stacks when used
Final attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Right-clicking the skill toggles a function ON/OFF to disable this skill from binding enemies
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Muscle Memory III
primary.shortDesc:
Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage +10% for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).
Refreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 350%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 0.2 sec
When bonus hit triggers, Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec, Protective Shield: blocks 7% of Max HP
Protective Shield can accumulate as much as 25% of Max HP, and consumes 30% + 50 of the current Protective Shield per sec
[Passive Effect: Damage for Summon Scimitar, Claw, Shuriken, Shotgun, Daggers, and Decoy Bomb are all increased by +170% points]
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit
Upon activating the additional chain attack, now enters <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state and grants a stacking %Max HP barrier that decays over time

Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-scimitar.png} tip={Summon Scimitar (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-claw.png} tip={Summon Claw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shuriken.png} tip={Summon Shuriken (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-shotgun.png} tip={Summon Shotgun (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-daggers.png} tip={Summon Daggers (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/summon-decoy-bomb.png} tip={Summon Decoy Bombs (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Cheap Shot II
primary.shortDesc: Damage Against Normal Monsters: +10%\nYour attacks against enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses gain Critical Rate +2% and Critical Damage +10%. Applies up to 7 Abnormal Statuses\nBleed Chance: 50%, Bleed Duration: 30 sec, Bleed Damage: 110% over 1 sec.
details: Increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage gained towards enemies affected by Abnormal Statuses
Increases max debuff stacks counted towards an enemy (from 5 to 7)
Now increases %Damage against regular monsters
Now grants successful attacks a chance to inflict a damaging debuff

primary.name: Weapons Expert
primary.shortDesc: For chain and all Summoned Weapons - Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +19%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Wisdom of Shadows II
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%, Boss Damage: +20%, Avoidability: +15%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Critical Chance
details: Increases %Crit Rate of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain-less Arts: Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of summoned weapon attacks

hyperPassive.name: Chain Arts: Thrash - Linked Attack Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Final Damage of skills used immediately after 1 hit of Chain Arts: Thrash +5% (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).

hyperPassive.name: Chain Arts: Beatdown - Shockwave Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of the shockwaves triggered by the secondary attack

hyperActive.name: Veteran Shadowdealer
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 20 sec, Multiplies the effects of Muscle Memory by 2\nCreates an explosion that attacks up to 6 enemies with 255% damage 3 times upon landing\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Doubles the effects of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff and successful attacks deal an additional attack

hyperActive.name: Chain Arts: Crush
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 510%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 15\nMuscle Memory at max stacks on hit, Duration: 15 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Create chains that strike from above
details: Upon successful hit, grants max stacks of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> Muscle Memory buff that lasts a shorter duration

hyperActive.name: Shadowdealer's Elixir
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Chain Arts: Void Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 55 sec. Creates giant chains that travel along an arbitrary path inflicting 770% damage 6 times to up to 10 enemies.\nChain Cooldown: 0.6 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, chains lash across the map damaging enemies in its path
details: Right-clicking the skill toggles the visual gray background ON/OFF
Unaffected by Damage Ignore and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Apocalypse Cannon
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000. Max Duration: 15 sec.
The cannon gathers energy for 10 sec., periodically inflicting 495% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies at set intervals.
Amasses up to 38 times, and increaases the caannon's duration if it's not fully amassed.
Can be resummoned by pressing the skill key again.
After amassing enough energy, it creates a supernova that deals 1650% damage 8 times to up to 15 enemies.
Cooldown: 25 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon a stationary cannon that charges up to fire an energy ball
details: While charging, enemies that collide with the cannon are damaged<bp_Upon reaching maximum charge time or attacking 38 times, the cannon fires_>
While summoned, pressing the Skill Key again will resummon the cannon to your position
<tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state will not be deactivated when using this skill or by the cannon's attacks
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Chain Arts: Maelstrom
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Deals damage for 8 sec at a certain interval. Damage: 660%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4. Upon attack, 100% chance to Slow enemies for 6 sec\nAttack speed gradually decreases based on time
fifthMain.desc: Place down a maelstrom of chains that continuously damages enemies within and applies a slow debuff
details: Maelstrom gradually reduces attack speed until it disappears
Can only be used as a combo after using 2 Thrash hits or by pressing Down Arrow Key and Attack Key
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Muscle Memory Finale
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 450, activates in location of nearby enemies upon hitting Muscle Memory additional hit 4 times
Additional Hit Activation: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 7
Muscle Memory Finale is prepared 1 each per 11 sec up to 3
Preparation time reduces by 2 sec when Chain Arts: Reign of Chains/Chain Arts: Beatdown/Chain Arts: Crush hits, reduces by 1 sec when Chain Arts: Void Strike hits
fifthMain.desc: Every 4 times <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/muscle-memory.png} tip={Muscle Memory (2nd Job)}> activates, chains will strike down onto enemies
details: Does not have a cooldown, instead stores charges (up to 3) and periodically prepares a charge

Using the following skills will decrease the charge time: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Chain Arts: Reign of Chains (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-beatdown.png} tip={Chain Arts: Beatdown (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-crush.png} tip={Chain Arts: Crush (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-void-strike.png} tip={Chain Arts: Void Strike (5th Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Thrash, Muscle Memory & Reign of Chains Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Thrash, Muscle Memory & Chain Arts: Reign of Chains Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Summon Daggers & Shuriken Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Summon Shotgun & Decoy Bomb Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Summon Shotgun & Summon Decoy Bomb Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Summon Brick Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Chain Arts: Beatdown Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Final Attack and Shock Wave Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Summon Spiked Bat Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Crush & Veteran Shadowdealer Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Crush & Veteran Shadowdealer Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Chain Arts: Thrash
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20
1st hit - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 2
2nd hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 5, Slow Chance: 100%, Slow Duration: 5 sec
Enhanced 2nd hit - Preparation Duration: every 10 sec, Max uses: 3
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 5, Shockwave Damage: 990%, Number of Shockwave Attacks: 10
Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +25% Final Damage (Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash).
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/nova/cadena/chain-arts-reign-of-chains.png} tip={Thrash, Muscle Memory, and Reign of Chains (1st Job / 2nd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Muscle Memory
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. [Stack Bonus] Attack Skill Final Damage: +11% for 30 sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chains Arts).
Refreshing or incrementing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. [Bonus Hits] Damage: 660%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 0.2 sec
When bonus hit triggers, Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec, Protective Shield: blocks 7% of Max HP
Protective Shield can accumulate as much as 25% of Max HP, and consumes 30% + 50 of the current Protective Shield per stack
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 3 sec

Summons a Shuriken, MP Cost: 33, Duration: 7 sec, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 849%
Number of Attacks: 1
Automatically explodes after 7 sec. Press the skill key again to manually detonate
Explosion deals 1293% damage to up to 8 enemies 3 times
Cooldown: 10 sec
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

2nd Hit - Damage: 783%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 13
3rd Hit - Damage 1160%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 14

Close-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 940%, Number of Attacks: 7
Mid-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 837%, Number of Attacks: 7
Long-Range Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 758%, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown: 5 sec

masteryCore.name: HEXA Summon Daggers
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 802%, Number of Attacks: 8, Terror Chance: 100%, Duration: 30 sec, Enemy DEF -30%\nCooldown: 10 sec

masteryCore.name: HEXA Summon Decoy Bomb
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, setting up a bomb that detonates after 1 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 8 sec

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Damage: 915%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 7\nCooldown: 8 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Chain Arts: Beatdown
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 282, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 508%, Number of Attacks: 2
Stun Duration: 10 sec
Increases stun duration up to 100% based on damage inflicted on enemies with Chain Arts: Beatdown.
For 5 sec after casting, depending on the number of additional hits activated by Muscle Memory, follow-up attack power is divided into 3 levels. If the number of activations isn't met within this time, Strike occurs at the minimum level. If the max activation acount is met within the time limit, the strike occurs immediately.
Strike: When Muscle Memory number of activations is 0, 3, 5, respectively, attacks up to 10 enemies in their grouped location based on the level with 1322%/1500%/1710% damage, respectively, 15 time(s), and activates a final attack that attacks 10 enemies with 420%/588%/840% damage, respectively, 10 time(s)
During the consecutive attacks, activates a shockwave that attacks up to 10 enemies with 1015% damage 4 time(s). Additional DEF ignored: +80%.
Cooldown: 120 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Chain Arts: Grand Arsenal
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15
1st linked attack - Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 8, Chase Cuts: 54
2nd linked attack - Damage: 730%, Number of Attacks: 9, Chase Cuts: 17
3rd linked attack - Damage: 780%, Number of Attacks: 14, Explosions: 60
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Chain Arts: Void Strike Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Chain Arts: Void Strike Final Damage: +60%

meta: Cadena is a fun and mobile class that utilizes a variety of weapons to create a combination of attacks. She is strong at mobbing but still has the skills to make this class exceptionally well at bossing. Skills that you gain in 1st job to 3rd job, you will still utilize in 4th job
